bill.title: Extreme Risk Protection Order Act of 2021
bill.description: To support State, Tribal, and local efforts to remove access to firearms from individuals who are a danger to themselves or others pursuant to court orders for this purpose.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security
